org.jboss.aerogear.android.security

Interface EncryptionService

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    AbstractEncryptionService, KeyStoreBasedEncryptionEncryptionServices, PassphraseGeneratedEncryptionServices

    public interface EncryptionService
    Classes which implement this interface are responsible for providing encryption services to AeroGear.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      byte[] decrypt(byte[] message)
      Decrypt the message with an application scoped IV
      byte[] decrypt(byte[] iv, byte[] message)
      Decrypt the message with an IV
      byte[] encrypt(byte[] message)
      Encrypt the message with an application scoped IV
      byte[] encrypt(byte[] iv, byte[] message)
      Encrypt the message with a iv

    • Method Detail

      • encrypt

        byte[] encrypt(byte[] message)
        Encrypt the message with an application scoped IV
        Parameters:
        message - the message to encrypt
        Returns:
        a encrypted version of message

      • encrypt

        byte[] encrypt(byte[] iv,
               byte[] message)
        Encrypt the message with a iv
        Parameters:
        message - the message to encrypt
        iv - The IV to encrypted the message with
        Returns:
        an encrypted version of the method

      • decrypt

        byte[] decrypt(byte[] message)
        Decrypt the message with an application scoped IV
        Parameters:
        message - the message to decrypt
        Returns:
        the decrypted method

      • decrypt

        byte[] decrypt(byte[] iv,
               byte[] message)
        Decrypt the message with an IV
        Parameters:
        message - the message to decrypt
        iv - The IV to encrypted the message with
        Returns:
        the message decrypted
